arts.ttl: Union Berlin thrash Hoffenheim 4-0 in relegation six-pointer
arts.sum: Union Berlin players Ivan Prtajin, Wooyeong Jeong, Benedict Hollerbach, and Rani Khedira celebrate their comprehensive victory over Hoffenheim - IMAGO/Oliver Zimmermann Benedict Hollerbach fires home the opening goal for Union Berlin past Hoffenheim goalkeeper Luca Philipp.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Huge wins for Stuttgart, Freiburg and Union Berlin, goalless draws in Wolfsburg and Mainz
arts.sum: On a dramatic afternoon across the Bundesliga, VfB Stuttgart, Union Berlin and SC Freiburg secured huge wins to get their league form back on track, whilst goalless draws containing Mainz, Augsburg, Wolfsburg and Bayer Leverkusen questioned the respective European and title credentials of Mainz and Bayer Leverkusen.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs Union Berlin preview: Crucial bottom half clash in Sinsheim
arts.sum: Hoffenheim and Union Berlin go head to head in a clash at the bottom end of the Bundesliga at the PreZero Arena this weekend, with both sides looking to kickstart a run of form to lift themselves out of trouble.

arts.ttl: Preview: Hoffenheim vs. Union Berlin - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Hoffenheim and Union Berlin, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Oral Arguments in disputed Union Berlin-Bochum match set for February
arts.sum: The German FA officially set a date to hear oral arguments in the case of a disputed match between VfL Bochum and 1. FC Union Berlin.
